divs: Sighting DetailsREFERENCE THE FOLLOWING REPORTS: 17056,17327,17431,17438... I have several minutes of video of a very large craft flying enormous circles around my town. Everytime I go to take video of this object I think its some sort of airplane. But once in a while it will stop in the distance and many other lights will appear around it. The size and shape are difficult to determine but aside from the very first sighting I can hear this object. It sounds like a low roaring jet engine. There are usually 3 white lights in a triangle formation that are constantly lit, although at times there are only two. There is always a flashing red and a flashing white light. I have no idea what this is and am very conflicted as to what I am seeing. If this is an airplane what is it doing flying circles around my town, and what are all the light anomalies that I am seeing? I will have video uploaded before the weekend is over but I have video from the 10th to the 13th of this object. This craft is accompanied by flashes of light in the sky. I have video record from the 10th of bright flashes of light coming from the direction of the Ursa Major constellation. I need someone to review and enhance my video as soon as possible.
Summary: Triangle light formation circling my town.
